body_html: I do not set /gpu:0 or /gpu:3 in side of the python code at this time. I only use CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES="3" to set current process see one GPU only. As I already set CUDA_​DEVICE_​ORDER=PCI_BUS_ID, I expect that current process only see the visible device, which is 3. But in fact it is not.

body: I do not set /gpu:0 or /gpu:3 in side of the python code at this time. I only use CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES="3" to set current process see one GPU only. As I already set CUDA_​DEVICE_​ORDER=PCI_BUS_ID, I expect that current process only see the visible device, which is 3. But in fact it is not.
